name: Village Craft
description:
Village Craft is a cute indie game where you have to craft resources (such as wood) to build houses, take fishes to eat... 

Fight against other teams to be the only last one.

Play on standalone mode or on online with friends or other people.

! warning !

To activate the game, you need a licence key.  Check you get a licence while purchasing the game.

In case of problems, please, contact me at : 

greendroid_contact@yahoo.fr or here.
